statements: SELECT * FROM supplier_performance;
SELECT supplier_name, total_orders FROM supplier_performance;
SELECT * FROM supplier_performance WHERE late_deliveries > 0;
SELECT supplier_name, total_deliveries FROM supplier_performance WHERE total_deliveries > 50;
SELECT supplier_name, total_orders, total_deliveries FROM supplier_performance ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM supplier_performance WHERE total_orders > 100 ORDER BY total_orders DESC
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name FROM supplier_performance WHERE late_deliveries > 5 ORDER BY late_deliveries ASC
SELECT supplier_name, total_orders, total_deliveries FROM supplier_performance WHERE total_deliveries < 50 ORDER BY supplier_name ASC
SELECT * FROM supplier_performance WHERE supplier_name LIKE '%a%' AND total_deliveries > 10 ORDER BY supplier_id ASC
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, total_orders, total_deliveries, late_deliveries FROM supplier_performance ORDER BY supplier_id DESC
SELECT * FROM supplier_performance_data;
SELECT supplier_name, total_orders FROM supplier_performance_data WHERE total_orders > 100;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, total_orders, order_fulfillment_rate FROM supplier_performance_data ORDER BY total_orders DESC;
SELECT * FROM vendor_management_data WHERE contract_expiry_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT vendor_id, vendor_name FROM vendor_management_data WHERE total_contracts BETWEEN 5 AND 10;
SELECT supplier_name, total_orders FROM supplier_performance_data WHERE total_orders > 100 ORDER BY total_orders DESC
SELECT * FROM vendor_management_data WHERE vendor_name LIKE 'A%'
SELECT supplier_name, order_fulfillment_rate FROM supplier_performance_data WHERE order_fulfillment_rate >= 0.9 ORDER BY order_fulfillment_rate DESC
SELECT vendor_name, total_contracts, contract_expiry_date FROM vendor_management_data WHERE total_contracts > 50 AND YEAR(contract_expiry_date) = 2022
SELECT * FROM supplier_performance_data, vendor_management_data WHERE supplier_id = vendor_id
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, performance_rating FROM products JOIN performance_data ON products.product_id = performance_data.product_id WHERE performance_rating > 3;

SELECT supplier_name, product_name, performance_rating FROM suppliers JOIN products ON suppliers.supplier_id = products.supplier_id JOIN performance_data ON products.product_id = performance_data.product_id;
SELECT product_name, performance_rating FROM products JOIN performance_data ON products.product_id = performance_data.product_id ORDER BY performance_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT products.product_name, performance_rating FROM products JOIN performance_data ON products.product_id = performance_data.product_id;

SELECT supplier_name, product_name, performance_rating FROM suppliers JOIN products ON suppliers.supplier_id = products.supplier_id JOIN performance_data ON products.product_id = performance_data.product_id WHERE performance_rating > 3;
SELECT supplier_name, COUNT(product_id) AS total_products FROM suppliers LEFT JOIN products ON suppliers.supplier_id = products.supplier_id GROUP BY supplier_name;
SELECT * FROM supplier_performance_data;
SELECT supplier_name, performance_rating FROM supplier_performance_data;
SELECT * FROM supplier_orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_contact FROM supplier_performance_data WHERE performance_rating > 3;
SELECT supplier_id, AVG(rating_value) AS avg_rating FROM supplier_ratings GROUP BY supplier_id;
SELECT * FROM supplier_performance_data WHERE performance_rating > 3 ORDER BY performance_rating DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_contact FROM supplier_performance_data WHERE performance_rating < 2;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_contact, performance_rating FROM supplier_performance_data WHERE supplier_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT supplier_contact, performance_rating FROM supplier_performance_data WHERE supplier_contact IS NOT NULL;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_rating.rating_value FROM supplier_performance_data JOIN supplier_ratings ON supplier_performance_data.supplier_id = supplier_ratings.supplier_id;
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, location FROM suppliers;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT purchase_id, quantity, purchase_date FROM purchases ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT rating_id, supplier_id, score FROM ratings WHERE score >= 4 ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT * FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC, location ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, price, supplier_name, location FROM products JOIN suppliers ON products.supplier_id = suppliers.supplier_id WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM suppliers JOIN ratings ON suppliers.supplier_id = ratings.supplier_id GROUP BY supplier_name HAVING AVG(rating) > 4;

SELECT product_name, purchase_date, quantity, payment_date, amount FROM products JOIN purchases ON products.product_id = purchases.product_id JOIN payments ON purchases.purchase_id = payments.purchase_id ORDER BY purchase_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT rating_id, supplier_name, rating_date, score FROM ratings JOIN suppliers ON ratings.supplier_id = suppliers.supplier_id ORDER BY rating_date DESC, score DESC LIMIT 5;
